    <div class="wrapper home home">
        <header>

  <div class="updates">
      <div>
      <a href="https://twitter.com/neymarjr/status/758446612461092866" target="_blank">
        <span class="update-source">tweet</span>
        <span class="update-headline">Work Hard

  <h2 class="title">
    <a href="http://www.neymaroficial.com/pt/quadrinhos">quadrinhos</a>
  </h2>
  <div class="ui ui-seta ui-seta-left"><span class="cta">&lt;</span></div>
  <div class="ui ui-seta ui-seta-right"><span class="cta">&gt;</span></div>
  <div class="scroll">
    <ul>
              <li class="njr-card">
      <a href="http://www.neymaroficial.com/pt/posts/tirinha-24"
       style="background-image: url(http://s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_b7b52d605e41453ebeff44ef5a3a5f8a/10d660/uploads/0.04180600-1490097491_170_114_78.jpg)">

    </a>
    <div class="tooltip-njr">
      <h3>Tirinha 24</h3>
      <span></span>
    </div>
  </li>              <li class="njr-card">
      <a href="http://www.neymaroficial.com/pt/posts/tirinha-23"
       style="background-image: url(http://s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_b7b52d605e41453ebeff44ef5a3a5f8a/10d660/uploads/0.30975700-1489507689_76_134_170.jpg)">
        23
    </a>
    <div class="tooltip-njr">
      <h3>Tirinha 23</h3>
      <span></span>
    </div>

</div>                              <div class="category-strip sombra">
  <h2 class="title">
    <a href="http://www.neymaroficial.com/pt/neymar-jrs-five">Neymar Jr's Five</a>
  </h2>

</div>                              <div class="category-strip sombra">
  <h2 class="title">
    <a href="http://www.neymaroficial.com/pt/puskas">Puskás</a>
  </h2>
  <div class="ui ui-seta ui-seta-left"><span class="cta">&lt;</span></div>
  <div class="ui ui-seta ui-seta-right"><span class="cta">&gt;</span></div>
  <div class="scroll">
    <ul>
              <li class="njr-card">
